title: Class: Vector
intro: The Vector class specifies a Vector, or point, on the canvas. It has a few methods for translating, scaling, roatating, etc the Vector.

main.name: Vector
main.description: The main Vector constructor. Calling without arguments returns a Vector at (0,0).

children.name: copy
children.description: Copy the values of the other Vector to this one. Returns this Vector.

arguments.name: other
arguments.description: The Vector to copy the values from.

children.name: clone
children.description: Clone this Vector to a new one, and return that one.

children.name: perpendicular
children.description: Change this Vector to be perpendicular to the original.

children.name: normalize
children.description: Normalize this Vector, i.e. make it unit-lengthed.

children.name: add
children.description: Add the other vector to this one.

children.name: subtract
children.desription: Subtract the other Vector from this one.

arguments.name: other
arguments.description: The Vector to subtract from the original.

children.name: scale
children.description: Scale the Vector by the given factors, in x and y directions.

arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The factor by which to scale the Vector in the x direction.

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The factor by which to scale the Vector in the y direction.

children.name: rotateP
children.description: Rotate this Vector (counter-clockwise) around the given point.

arguments.name: angle
arguments.description: The angle by which to rotate, in radians.

arguments.name: point
arguments.description: The point around which to rotate.

children.name: project
children.description: Project this Vector onto another one.

arguments.name: other
arguments.description: The Vector to project the original on.

children.name: reflect
children.description: Reflect this Vector on an arbitrary axis.

children.name: dot
children.description: Get the dot product of this Vector with another one.

children.name: len2
children.description: Get the squared length of this Vector.

children.name: len
children.description: Get the length of this Vector.
